author: CBS News
title: China revises coronavirus death toll after lockdown ends
description: China revised its coronavirus death count Friday, adding over 1,300 deaths in Wuhan. The Chinese government has faced accusations of downplaying their death toll and a slow initial response to the virus. Ramy Inocencio reports.
